name: UpdateDatasetInfo
description:
Update specific dataset information in a project.

Call this tool to update specific details of a dataset within a project in Datadog. Useful for modifying metadata or configurations of existing datasets.

parameters.name: dataset_uuid
parameters.description: A UUID string that uniquely identifies the dataset to be updated.

value_schema.description: A UUID string identifying this dataset.

parameters.name: project_identifier
parameters.description: The ID of the project to be accessed. Retrieve using a call to /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

parameters.name: dataset_update_details
parameters.description: A JSON object containing the dataset update details such as id, name, description, metadata, and other relevant fields.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: A UUID string identifying this dataset.

value_schema.description: A UUID string identifying this dataset.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.
